author: bmanikm
body: Updated the logic to remove PSGetModuleInfo.xml from PowerShellGet module on Non-Windows platforms.

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body:
Does it really need to be that complicated to delete a single file?  Isn't it in a well-known location?  Should it just be something like:

```PowerShell
Remove-Item -Path $Destination\$(_.Name)\*\PSGetModuleInfo.xml -Force
```

comments.author: bmanikm
comments.body: Thanks @lzybkr ! I have incorporated the suggested change.

title: [Build] Remove PSGetModuleInfo.xml from PowerShellGet module on Non-Windows platforms
